text: Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde na phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, gu guigira won ndavar nde nɨɨŋgi, nde thɨgɨ havhargip thaneŋ phogirɨ thari. Nde khueŋ kaŋgi, nza Guma Bakɨme nzuav ŋaara mbatɨga mbui, mba ŋaar fhura mbar ŋgɨgɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde zazera khaŋ tɨgɨp ŋkasŋkagip, Guma Bakɨmen ŋaarar muuŋri.
